title: Vase, ca. 1825–30
provenance: Howard Phillips, London; 1964 Phelps Warren, NY
description: Tall straight-sided bow with wide turned-over rim and flat bottom spool stem on wide flat circular base; turned-over rim cut with all-over diamond pattern, notched at rim, band of strawberry diamonds center of side, prismatic band above, fluting below; glass slightly greehish

tombstone.epitaph:
Vase, ca. 1825–30.
ca. 1825–30. glass. Bequest of Walter Phelps Warren. 1986-61-160.
